attributes.action: Stop the referendum on Scottish Independence
attributes.additional_details:
Now, you allow Scotland to get independence? You must be joking! Remember that in the last century how the British colonized so many places on Earth? Remember the glorious state of ruling so many lands? Where is the British Empire which used to be so great, so admirable, so marvelous and so prestigious?

Can you see how the Uyghur, the Great Tibet, Inner Mongolia, Canton, etc. people are living now? They are living under the most brutal, illegal and horrible rule of the Chinese Communist Party. If the Great Britain lost its strong military strengths over China, how can it defend itself against China, and help to liberate Uyghur and Great Tibet, etc. from the devil’s claws? The splitting of Scotland from England will have a “de- synergy” effect, causing the military powers much weakened in the British Empire.

It is urgent and necessary that you ban the so-called “referendum” on Scottish independence, which must be ceased at all costs!!!
